short_summary: The Correctional Service of Canada is looking for a dental services provider for its Springhill Institution in Nova Scotia.
description: The contractor must provide dental health services to inmates at Springhill Institution, following the National Essential Health Services Framework. This includes coordinating care with dental specialists, managing dental clinic lists and appointment schedules, and documenting dental assessments and treatments. The contractor must also ensure that dental instrument sterilization is done by trained personnel according to Provincial standards. Additionally, the contractor must provide instruction on oral health and care maintenance of pre-fitted appliances, and obtain vital signs. The contractor may have to deal with emergency situations and provide first aid and CPR. The contractor must also ensure that all aspects of dental care services, including coordination of care provided by dental specialists, are maintained and integrated in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework. The contractor must supervise the activities of the dental assistants provided under the contract and ensure that they perform tasks such as preparing the treatment/clinic area, cleaning and sterilizing instruments and handpieces, and providing inmate education on oral health. The contractor must also prepare dental clinic lists and appointment schedules triaged based on requisitions received and dental emergencies as they arise. The contractor must provide the services during clinics held at Springhill Institution, up to a maximum of 17.5 hours on a weekly basis. It is expected that the contract will be from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025.

full_summary:
# Solicitation for Dental Services at Springhill Institution

## Notice

Notice Title ¦ Dental Services at Springhill Institution
Notice Type ¦ Request for Proposal
Number of Clinics ¦ 260 Clinics

## Description

The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for dental services to be provided to inmates at the Springhill Institution, located in Springhill, NS. The contract will be awarded based on a lowest priced compliant bid.

## Statement of Work

The successful bidder will be required to provide essential dental services to inmates at Springhill Institution, in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework. The services will include:

* Providing and coordinating essential dental services to inmates
* Preparing dental clinic lists and appointment schedules
* Managing all aspects of dental care services
* Documenting dental assessment, treatment, and consultations in the inmate’s Dental Record Folder
* Providing a dental assistant and backup personnel to ensure continuity of service
* Supervising the activities of dental assistants provided under the contract

## Specifications

* Estimated quantity of commodity: N/A
* Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2025-03-31
* Time frame of delivery: N/A
* Nature of requirements: Essential dental services to inmates

## Trade Agreements

* Trade agreement: N/A
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: N/A
* Règlement sur les droits des Premières Nations et les terres hold-up: N/A

## Security Requirements

* Security requirements: Included in the contract
* Clearance requirements: N/A
* Other security requirements: N/A

## Condition de participation des fournisseurs

* Mandatory requirements: N/A
* Conditions for participation: N/A

## Language of Service

* Language of Service: Bilingual (English and French)

## Conditions for Award of Contract

* Lowest priced compliant bid

## Evaluation Criteria

* Compliant bid
* Lowest price

## Time Frame for Submission

* The solicitation document and associated documents are available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders website.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days of receipt of the bid solicitation results.
